text: Cristian Favela (born November 12, 1979 in Los Mochis, Sinaloa) is a Mexican professional boxer in the Welterweight division and is the former WBC Continental Americas Featherweight Champion.http://fightnights.com/boxers.php?id=1046 ==Pro career== On October 15, 2010 Favela knocked out the veteran Alfredo Valenzuela at the Hotel Imperial in Agua Prieta, Sonora, Mexico.http://boxrec.com/show_display.php?show_id=609298 ===Professional Record=== |- style="margin:0.5em auto; font-size:95%;" |align="center" colspan=8|38 Wins (24 knockouts, 14 decisions), 32
